title: GHOSTS: 2014 edition
description: Perhaps the scariest book you will ever read....  Enter a world where the departed return to the world of the living....where ghosts walk and intermingle among us.....  Nantucket Island. Quiet. Peaceful. Idyllic. For Oscar-winning actress Annette Carlson, it is the perfect refuge from a demanding career. For brilliant burned-out cop Tim Brooks, it's a chance to get away from the crime-ridden streets of the big city. And for Reverend George Osaro, ghost hunter, it is about to become a place of unspeakable terror....
author: Noel Hynd
